name: Unreal Triple: Card Game
description:
The game is made in 5 days for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1. I didn't have enough time to finish the game in the way I wanted but I modified it so it should be still fun to play.

Left Click to use a card. Each card have their own effect.

Unreal cards are the special cards which would cast their effects twice.

Each turn passed "sane" would -1 and "end" would +1.

Game ends when sane == 0 or end == 10.

Effect of the cards

Void: "Add Sun, Moon, Math per each into the middle deck. Gain 3 Sane.", Star: "Add a random card into the middle deck, change left and right deck,effect doesn't trigger on change.", Sun: "Add 3 stars to the middle deck. Gain 3 sane. Lose 2 end.", Moon: "Change Left and Right cards into <color=red> unreal </color=red>cards. Unreal cards will have double effect.", Rule: "Change left and right cards. Add 2 random cards into middle deck. Gain 2 end.", Time: "Clear the whole middle deck. Add a void.", Life: "Add a random card into the right deck, add a seed into the left deck.Gain 3 sane.", Seed: "Add a growth into the left deck. Gain 3 Sane.", Growth: "Add a random card into the left deck, add a seed into the left deck.", Loop: "Lose half of sane, lose half of end. Add a random card to the left deck.Change middle and right card.", Heal: "Change the middle and right deck, clear the whole left deck, add a seed to the left deck. Change the middle card to <color=red> unreal </color=red>.", Heart: "Add 2 random cards to the left. Change the middle card to <color=red>unreal</color=red>. Gain 2 sane, gain 2 end.", Mind: "Add 2 random cards into the right deck. Gain 3 sane.", Knowledge: "Gain 3 sane, gain 2 end. Clear right deck. Add faith.", Faith: "Lose 3 sane, lose 3 end, add a mind into the right deck.", Value: "Make sane equals the end number, add a random to the right deck.", Harmony: "Make the end number equal to sane,add a random to the right deck.", Emotion: "Add 1-2 random cards to each deck, lose 2 sane. Change middle or left into <color=red>unreal</color=red>."
